Ancient Honor Guard Helmet.name: Ancient Honor Guard Helmet
Ancient Honor Guard Helmet.description: An ancient heavy helmet with intricate decoration.

Ancient Household Helmet.name: Ancient Household Helmet
Ancient Household Helmet.description: An ancient light helmet that time has taken a toll on over many years.

Ancient Legionary Helmet.name: Ancient Legionary Helmet
Ancient Legionary Helmet.description: A well-crafted but partly decayed helmet of ancient design.

Barbute Helmet.name: Barbute Helmet
Barbute Helmet.description: A sturdy yet light barbute helmet, a design uncommon in these lands, made from especially light and durable steel.

Bascinet with Mail.name: Bascinet with Mail
Bascinet with Mail.description: A metal bascinet worn atop a thick mail coif.

Bear Headpiece.name: Bear Headpiece
Bear Headpiece.description: The dried and prepped head of a large bear. Offers some protection, but is mostly donned for the looks.

Beastmaster's Headpiece.name: Beastmaster's Headpiece
Beastmaster's Headpiece.description: A headpiece with long horns, fashioned in tradition of barbarian beastmasters for generations.

Closed Flat Top Helmet.name: Closed Flat Top Helmet
Closed Flat Top Helmet.description: A closed helmet with complete faceguard. Hard to breathe in and limiting the field of view.

Closed Flat Top with Mail.name: Closed Flat Top with Mail
Closed Flat Top with Mail.description: A closed helmet with complete faceguard and a mail coif covering the neck. Great in the way of protection but hard to breathe in and limiting the field of view.

Closed and Padded Flat Top.name: Closed and Padded Flat Top
Closed and Padded Flat Top.description: A closed helmet with complete faceguard and a padded coif underneath. Hard to breathe in and limiting the field of view.

Closed Mail Coif.name: Closed Mail Coif
Closed Mail Coif.description: A mail coif with added protection for the face.

Closed Scrap Metal Helmet.name: Closed Scrap Metal Helmet
Closed Scrap Metal Helmet.description: This heavy metal helmet also protects the wearer's face, albeit at the cost of visibility.

Conic Helmet with Closed Mail.name: Conic Helmet with Closed Mail
Conic Helmet with Closed Mail.description: A heavy conic helmet with a full closed mail skirt for additional protection.

Conic Helmet with Faceguard.name: Conic Helmet with Faceguard
Conic Helmet with Faceguard.description: This conic helmet with mail has an attached metal faceguard. It is heavy and hard to see through, but offers excellent protection.

Crude Faceguard Helmet.name: Crude Faceguard Helmet
Crude Faceguard Helmet.description: A crude and rusty barbarian helmet. What it lacks in finesse it makes up for in thickness.

Crude Metal Helmet.name: Crude Metal Helmet
Crude Metal Helmet.description: Although crudely made and rusty, this metal helmet is a durable and sturdy piece of armor.

Cultist Hood.name: Cultist Hood
Cultist Hood.description: A rough spun cloth bag with two holes in it.

Cultist Leather Hood.name: Cultist Leather Hood
Cultist Leather Hood.description: A thick leather hood that covers the head and neck but limits vision.

Dark Cowl.name: Dark Cowl
Dark Cowl.description: A sturdy hat and cowl made out of leather and cloth.

Decayed Closed Flat Top with Mail.name: Decayed Closed Flat Top with Mail
Decayed Closed Flat Top with Mail.description: A worn and torn closed helmet with complete faceguard and a mail coif covering the neck. It has obviously been lying outdoors for a while.

Covered Decayed Closed Flat Top with Mai.name: Covered Decayed Closed Flat Top with Mail
Covered Decayed Closed Flat Top with Mai.description: A worn and torn closed helmet with complete faceguard and a mail coif covering the neck, underneath a rotten cloth sack. It has obviously been lying outdoors for a while.

Decayed Full Helm.name: Decayed Full Helm
Decayed Full Helm.description: This full helm suffers from rusty metal parts and brittle leather inlays but still offers good protection if you ignore its stench.

Decayed Great Helm.name: Decayed Great Helm
Decayed Great Helm.description: A great helmet with torn off and rotten decorations. It must have once belonged to a renowned knight.

Padded Dented Nasal Helmet.name: Padded Dented Nasal Helmet
Padded Dented Nasal Helmet.description: A dented metal nasal helmet that has seen some fighting.

The Emperor's Countenance.name: The Emperor's Countenance
The Emperor's Countenance.description: A golden helmet and facemask, showing the visage of an emperor from an age long past, imbued with mystical energies. When you hold it into the light, it almost looks as if the face were moving and making expressions of disgust.

Decorated Full Helm.name: Decorated Full Helm
Decorated Full Helm.description: A closed metal helm with breathing holes and intricate decoration ontop. Great in the way of protection, a piece of art to behold, but hard to breathe in and limiting the field of view.

Feathered Hat.name: Feathered Hat
Feathered Hat.description: A fancy feathered hat usually worn by minstrels or nobles.

Flat Top Helmet.name: Flat Top Helmet
Flat Top Helmet.description: A flat full-metal helmet with noseguard.

Flat Top with Closed Mail.name: Flat Top with Closed Mail
Flat Top with Closed Mail.description: A flat full-metal helmet with a mail coif covering the neck and face.

Flat Top with Mail.name: Flat Top with Mail
Flat Top with Mail.description: A flat full-metal helmet with noseguard and a mail coif underneath.

Full Aketon Cap.name: Full Aketon Cap
Full Aketon Cap.description: A large padded cloth cap also covering the neck.

Full Helm.name: Full Helm
Full Helm.description: A closed metal helm with breathing holes. Great in the way of protection but hard to breathe in and limiting the field of view.

Full Leather Cap.name: Full Leather Cap
Full Leather Cap.description: A closed leather cap that protects the head and neck. Padded for extra protection.

Zweihander's Helmet.name: Zweihander's Helmet
Zweihander's Helmet.description: A sturdy metal helmet with added padding, covered with a large feathered hat.

Duelist's Hat.name: Duelist's Hat
Duelist's Hat.description: A thick leather hat with ornaments and feathers.

Headscarf.name: Headscarf
Headscarf.description: A thick piece of cloth wrapped around the head.

Heavy Horned Plate Helmet.name: Heavy Horned Plate Helmet
Heavy Horned Plate Helmet.description: This heavy helmet has ornamental horns attached. This is a sign of high standing and reputation within barbarian warbands.

Hood.name: Hood
Hood.description: A simple hood to protect against weather and scratches.

Hunter's Hat.name: Hunter's Hat
Hunter's Hat.description: A thick felt hat decorated with feathers as a hunter's trophy.

Helmet of the Ijirok.name: Helmet of the Ijirok
Helmet of the Ijirok.description: Once a barbarian helmet broken in battle, this piece has been bathed in the blood of the legendary Ijirok. Powers beyond your understanding mended it whole again, and will likewise mend any wounds of the wearer as well.

Jester's Hat.name: Jester's Hat
Jester's Hat.description: The colorful and iconic headpiece of jesters, entertainers and other traveling folk.

Kettle hat.name: Kettle hat
Kettle hat.description: A full-metal helmet with a broad rim.

Kettle Hat with Closed Mail.name: Kettle Hat with Closed Mail
Kettle Hat with Closed Mail.description: A full-metal helmet with a broad rim and a mail coif covering the neck and face.

Kettle Hat with Mail.name: Kettle Hat with Mail
Kettle Hat with Mail.description: A full-metal helmet with a broad rim and a mail coif underneath.

Leather Headband.name: Leather Headband
Leather Headband.description: A dried and folded leather headband designed to protect the forehead.

Leather Helmet.name: Leather Helmet
Leather Helmet.description: A thick leather helmet fashioned from cured hides. The animals these once belonged to were certainly dangerous game.

Mail Coif.name: Mail Coif
Mail Coif.description: A mail coif that also protects the neck.

Glimpse of Davkul.name: Glimpse of Davkul
Glimpse of Davkul.description: The Glimpse of Davkul is a gift bestowed upon man by ancient and dark powers, a helmet merged with human skin and bones through the most unspeakable of rituals. A glimpse of a future where man shall become one with creations from a realm beyond. It shall never break, but instead keep regrowing its scarred skin on the spot.

Mouth Piece.name: Mouth Piece
Mouth Piece.description: A piece of cloth covering the lower face to protect from breathing in dust or prevent identification.

Nasal Helmet.name: Nasal Helmet
Nasal Helmet.description: A metal helmet with added noseguard.

Nasal Helmet with Closed Mail.name: Nasal Helmet with Closed Mail
Nasal Helmet with Closed Mail.description: A metal helmet with a noseguard and a closed mail coif underneath.

Nasal Helmet with Mail.name: Nasal Helmet with Mail
Nasal Helmet with Mail.description: A metal helmet with added noseguard and a mail coif underneath.

Nasal Helmet With Rusty Mail.name: Nasal Helmet With Rusty Mail
Nasal Helmet With Rusty Mail.description: A worn and used helmet with a rusty mail coif.

Nordic Helmet.name: Nordic Helmet
Nordic Helmet.description: A nordic helmet guarding face and neck with additional metal plates.

Nordic Helmet with Closed Mail.name: Nordic Helmet with Closed Mail
Nordic Helmet with Closed Mail.description: A metal nordic helmet with an attached closed mail neck guard.

Open Leather Cap.name: Open Leather Cap
Open Leather Cap.description: A sturdy leather cap that is not covering the ears and neck.

Padded Flat Top Helmet.name: Padded Flat Top Helmet
Padded Flat Top Helmet.description: A flat full-metal helmet with noseguard and a padded coif underneath.

Padded Kettle hat.name: Padded Kettle hat
Padded Kettle hat.description: A full-metal helmet with a broad rim and a padded coif underneath.

Padded Nasal Helmet.name: Padded Nasal Helmet
Padded Nasal Helmet.description: A metal helmet with added noseguard and a padded coif underneath.

Reinforced Mail Coif.name: Reinforced Mail Coif
Reinforced Mail Coif.description: A mail coif with additional metal noseguard.

Rusty Mail Coif.name: Rusty Mail Coif
Rusty Mail Coif.description: A rusty mail coif that still offers good protection - it leaves horrible stains though.

Sallet Helmet.name: Sallet Helmet
Sallet Helmet.description: A metal sallet helmet with an extended neckguard, a design uncommon in these lands. It is well crafted to offer maximum protection with minimum weight, and without impairing vision.

Steppe Helmet with Mail.name: Steppe Helmet with Mail
Steppe Helmet with Mail.description: A nasal helmet witch an attached mail neck guard fashioned in the way of the steppe folks.

Straw Hat.name: Straw Hat
Straw Hat.description: A crude straw hat to protect against the sun.

Witchhunter's Hat.name: Witchhunter's Hat
Witchhunter's Hat.description: A tough leather hat that provides decent protection against scratches.

Wizard's Hat.name: Wizard's Hat
Wizard's Hat.description: A pointy hat with a broad rim.

Assassin's Face Mask.name: Assassin's Face Mask
Assassin's Face Mask.description: An assassin's face mask and head wrap.

Assassin's Head Wrap.name: Assassin's Head Wrap
Assassin's Head Wrap.description: The dark head wrap of an assassin.

Blade Dancer's Head Wrap.name: Blade Dancer's Head Wrap
Blade Dancer's Head Wrap.description: This distinct red and black head wrap is traditionally worn by the most skilled warriors of the nomad tribes.

Desert Stalker's Head Wrap.name: Desert Stalker's Head Wrap
Desert Stalker's Head Wrap.description: A thick head wrap with small hidden leather strings for added protection, adorned with a bronze scorpion.

Engineer's Hat.name: Engineer's Hat
Engineer's Hat.description: A finely wrapped cloth turban with insignia declaring the wearer a learned engineer from the city states.

Gladiator Helmet.name: Gladiator Helmet
Gladiator Helmet.description: An impressive metal helmet crafted to intimidate the opponents of pit fighters in arenas of the southern city states.

Gunner's Hat.name: Gunner's Hat
Gunner's Hat.description: A finely wrapped cloth turban worn by those that practise the use of elaborate gunpowder weapons in armies of the city states.

Heavy Lamellar Helmet.name: Heavy Lamellar Helmet
Heavy Lamellar Helmet.description: A heavy helmet made from overlapping metal plates.

Leather Head Wrap.name: Leather Head Wrap
Leather Head Wrap.description: A thick leather head wrap that protects against cuts and bruises.

Nomad Head Wrap.name: Nomad Head Wrap
Nomad Head Wrap.description: A nomad style head wrap suited to protect against sun and heat.

Nomad Light Helmet.name: Nomad Light Helmet
Nomad Light Helmet.description: A light helmet typical of the southern desert regions.

Nomad Reinforced Helmet.name: Nomad Reinforced Helmet
Nomad Reinforced Helmet.description: A nomad helmet reinforced with mail.

Southern Head Wrap.name: Southern Head Wrap
Southern Head Wrap.description: A traditional southern head wrap suited for desert climate.

Southern Helmet with Coif.name: Southern Helmet with Coif
Southern Helmet with Coif.description: A southern metal helmet with a mail coif to protect the neck.

Spiked Skull Cap with Mail.name: Spiked Skull Cap with Mail
Spiked Skull Cap with Mail.description: A metal skull cap with a fashionable spike worn atop a mail coif.

Turban Helmet.name: Turban Helmet
Turban Helmet.description: A full helmet crafted from overlapping long metal splints in the shape of a traditional southern head wrap.

Wrapped Southern Helmet.name: Wrapped Southern Helmet
Wrapped Southern Helmet.description: This metal helmet is wrapped in cloth to protect against the blazingly hot sun of the southern deserts.
